chart.name: Kafka Bytes/sec
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kafka-bytes-in', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'all')).publish(label='A')
B = data('counter.kafka-bytes-out', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'all')).publish(label='B')

chart.name: G1 Old Gen
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Old Gen')).publish(label='A')
C = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Old Gen')).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Heap Memory Usage %
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap') and filter('hostHasService', 'kafka')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap') and filter('hostHasService', 'kafka')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('jmx_memory.max', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap') and filter('hostHasService', 'kafka')).publish(label='C')
D = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-heap') and filter('hostHasService', 'kafka')).publish(label='D', enable=False)
F = (D / C * 100).publish(label='F')

chart.description: GC Young Generation - Collection time in milliseconds
chart.name: GC: G1 Collection Time
chart.programText: A = data('total_time_in_ms.collection_time', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'gc-G1 Young Generation') and filter('hostHasService', 'kafka')).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Number of Topics in Kafka cluster (Available from 1.x.x)
chart.name: # Topics
Code Cache
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-Code Cache')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-Code Cache')).publish(label='B')
C = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-Code Cache')).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Bytes/Message
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kafka-messages-in').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.kafka-bytes-in').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B / A).publish(label='C')

chart.name: G1 Survivor Space
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Survivor Space')).publish(label='A')
B = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Survivor Space')).publish(label='B')
C = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Survivor Space')).publish(label='C')

chart.description: GC Young Generation - invocations per sec
chart.name: GC: G1 Invocations
chart.programText: A = data('invocations', filter=filter('plugin_instance', 'gc-G1 Young Generation') and filter('hostHasService', 'kafka')).publish(label='A')

chart.name: Avg Bytes/Message
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kafka-bytes-in').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.kafka-messages-in').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A / B).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Messages In/sec 24h Change %
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kafka-messages-in', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=1000).mean(over='1h').publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A).timeshift('1d').publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A/B - 1).scale(100).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Maximum lag in messages between the follower and leader replicas in milliseconds
chart.name: Top Brokers with Max Replication Lag
# Partitions
chart.programText:
A = data('gauge.kafka-underreplicated-partitions').publish(label='A')
B = data('gauge.kafka-partition-count', extrapolation='last_value', maxExtrapolations=5).publish(label='B')
C = alerts(detector_name='Kafka Partitions Underreplicated').publish(label='C')

chart.description: Non-Heap memory used percentage over committed
chart.name: Non-Heap Memory Used %
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-nonheap')).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-nonheap')).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory-nonheap')).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (100*C/B).publish(label='D')
E = (100*A/B).publish(label='E')

chart.name: G1 Eden Space
chart.programText:
A = data('jmx_memory.init', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Eden Space')).publish(label='A')
B = data('jmx_memory.committed', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Eden Space')).publish(label='B')
C = data('jmx_memory.used', filter=filter('hostHasService', 'kafka') and filter('plugin', 'GenericJMX') and filter('plugin_instance', 'memory_pool-G1 Eden Space')).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Zookeeper request latency in milliseconds (Available from 1.x.x)
chart.name: Zookeper Request Latency

chart.description: Number of classes loaded in the JVM
chart.name: Loaded classes

chart.description: ratio of bytes out : bytes in
chart.name: Read Amplification
chart.programText:
A = data('counter.kafka-bytes-in').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('counter.kafka-bytes-out').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (B / A).publish(label='C')
